reviewText: Must have for a Pee Wee fan!!!
Haven't seen Pee-Wee's Playhouse in years. Picked this bluray up as a lark for nostalgia. Really enjoyed it. One of the craziest kid's shows ever!
What's not to love about Pee-wee's Playhouse?

BEST CHRISTMAS SPECIAL EVER - Where else would you see Cher, Charo, Oprah, Grace Jones, Joan Rivers, Frankie and Anette and many more in one special.

Its colorful, funny and very much in the Christmas special.

Every home should have this DVD
One of the craziest parodies of the 50's kids shows you will EVER see  !!  With great guest stars, too.
I have had this for a long time and it is a Christmas tradition. Now I have it in blu Ray!
